TopicTitle: What's the name of that thing that does that thing...?

Articles.Content:
Was watching a Scott Manley video last night (Link here: https://youtu.be/sLeA0xrf06k?t=11m39s ) where there appears to be a hinged actuator with docking port he uses to deploy a component out of the bay of a space plane. It would work perfectly for a rover deployment system I have in mind. I've scoured the parts list in the wiki and don't see it so it must be a mod. Can you name which mod package it's from?

Cheers.
You're probably looking for Infernal Robotics.

Infernal Robotics.

Also, I think that this should be moved to Addon discussion.
Mr. Manley named Infernal Robotics as the source a few videos later so seems legit @Stargate525 Thanks.
Yep, it's an add-on thingy.  Moving to Add-on Discussions.
